question_text_en: What is the total duration for an agent that soaks an object whose state is GRABED in the kitchen after 2024-05-14T03:44:00 and before 2024-06-16T11:53:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:GRABED .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-05-14T03:44:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-16T11:53:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is GRABED
qualifiers_en.question: What is the total duration?

question_text_en: What is the total duration of the action where an agent squeezes an object whose attribute is cream in the bathroom after or at 2024-04-16T06:18:00 and before 2024-06-30T18:10:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (SUM(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:cream .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bathroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-16T06:18:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-30T18:10:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                    }

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose attribute is cream
qualifiers_en.question: What is the total duration?

question_text_en: What is the shortest duration involving an agent that uses text on an object whose state is OFF at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -1.35 for more than or equal to 10 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (MIN(?duration) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select distinct ?event where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:OFF .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-1.35"^^xsd:double > ?pos_z)
                
                    
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 10)
            
                        
                    }

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.time: more than or equal to 10 seconds
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -1.35
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is OFF
qualifiers_en.question: What is the shortest duration?

question_text_en: How many times per object does an agent find an object which is a subclass of Potato_1 in the kitchen for more than 0 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?object (COUNT(distinct ?event) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Potato_1 .
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration > 0)
            
                    } group by ?object

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Potato_1
qualifiers_en.question: How many times per object?

question_text_en: What is the average depth of the object soaked by an agent in the kitchen from 2024-04-07T20:16:00 to 2024-04-14T09:35:00, where the object's height is less than or equal to 0.53m?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT (AVG(?size_z) as ?answer) WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        ?event vh2kg:action ac:soak .
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y <= 0.53)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-07T20:16:00"^^xsd:dateTime <= ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-04-14T09:35:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:first ?size_x ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y ;
                        rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                
                    }

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose height is less than or equal to 0.53m
qualifiers_en.question: What is the average depth of the object?
